name: Shepard Fairey VR - DAMAGED
description: Shepard Fairey's work has been transformed into a virtual reality experience for the very first time, where he will share his thoughts and methods behind his work. Experience his most ambitious show to date, aptly titled DAMAGED.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 800 MB available space
